scripts.dev: concurrently "pnpm --filter=frontend dev" "cd apps/backend && uv run uvicorn app.main:app --reload --port 8000"
scripts.dev:backend: cd apps/backend && uv run uvicorn app.main:app --reload --port 8000
scripts.test: pnpm --filter=frontend test && cd apps/backend && uv run pytest
scripts.lint: pnpm --filter=frontend lint && cd apps/backend && uv run ruff check .
scripts.format: prettier --write "apps/frontend/**/*.{ts,tsx,md}" && cd apps/backend && uv run ruff format .
